errorMessage: Invalid Serverless Application Specification document. Number of errors found: 20. Resource with id [BothIdAndOtherProps] is invalid. Must provide 'Id' (with optional 'Qualifier') or a supported combination of other properties. Resource with id [EmptyDestination] is invalid. Missing required property 'Destination'. Resource with id [EmptyPermissions] is invalid. Missing required property 'Permissions'. Resource with id [EmptyPermissionsList] is invalid. 'Permissions' cannot be empty; valid values are: Read, Write. Resource with id [EmptyProperties] is invalid. Properties of a resource must be an object. Resource with id [MissingLambdaFunctionArn] is invalid. Unable to get Lambda function ARN from 'Destination' resource. Resource with id [MissingRole] is invalid. Unable to get IAM role name from 'Source' resource. Resource with id [MissingRoleDestination] is invalid. Unable to get IAM role name from 'Destination' resource. Resource with id [MissingSnsTopicArn] is invalid. Destination.Arn is missing. Resource with id [MissingSqsQueueUrl] is invalid. Unable to create connector from AWS::Events::Rule to AWS::SQS:Queue; it's not supported or the template is invalid. Resource with id [NoDestination] is invalid. Missing required property 'Destination'. Resource with id [NoIdMissingType] is invalid. 'Type' is missing or not a string. Resource with id [NoPermissions] is invalid. Missing required property 'Permissions'. Resource with id [NoStrId] is invalid. 'Id' is missing or not a string. Resource with id [NonDictConnector] is invalid. NonDictConnector should be a map. Resource with id [NonDictProperties] is invalid. Properties of a resource must be an object. Resource with id [NonExistentId] is invalid. Unable to find resource with logical ID 'ThisDoesntExist'. Resource with id [ResourceWithoutType] is invalid. 'Type' is missing or not a string. Resource with id [UnsupportedAccessCategory] is invalid. Unsupported 'Permissions' provided; valid values are: Read, Write. Resource with id [UnsupportedAccessCategoryCombination] is invalid. Unsupported 'Permissions' provided; valid combinations are: Read + Write.
